column4: yes, if vb and the host in the same network - set the vb network type to 'bridged' to obtain this
can you login using the Guest account?
what screen are you in now, how far can you get?
if you see compiz, then you are logged in
the gui log in screen loads, but after entering password comes a black screen then again the log in screen
take note, then: on your ubuntu machine, press ctrl-alt-F - you get a terminal screen - work from there
take note, then: on your ubuntu machine, press ctrl-alt-F1 - you get a terminal screen - work from there
